newsitem.title: SPAIN: BASKETBALL-BARCELONA COACH GARCIA RENESES QUITS.
newsitem.headline: BASKETBALL-BARCELONA COACH GARCIA RENESES QUITS.

text.p: Barcelona basketball coach Aito Garcia Reneses has agreed to leave the club just days after snatching the Spanish league title from arch-rivals Real Madrid.
Garcia Reneses took Barcelona to five European championship final fours but lost all of them and has come under fire from fans throughout the season. No replacement has yet been named.
